title: Miracle Winter - January 20 - Accessories/Emblems/Hearts/Rings
content: On Saturday, January 20, 2024, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Face Accessories, Eye Accessories, Pendants, Shoulders, Rings, Earrings, Belts, Badges, Emblems, and Android Hearts!

title: Check Out the January 2024 Art Corner
content: Look at this month's roundup of our favorite fan art!

title: Maple Memo: GMS Roadmap Q1 2024
content: We share our Global MapleStory Roadmap that includes the updates and changes coming in v.248 - v.249 2024.

title: [Completed] Scheduled Minor Patch - January 11, 2024
content: The minor patch has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 4 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: Cash Shop Update for January 10
content: Reboot Petite Luna Pets, Luna Crystal, Royal Styles, Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry, and more!

title: More Identisk Events to Enjoy!
content: It's time for the Identisk Festival Celebration! Head over to Identisk to check out the final additions to the island!
